detail_desc: Lace blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.

Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets, and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatpants is recycled.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket.

V-neck playsuit in satin with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck, cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and a detachable soft belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets and wide legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.

Waist belt in imitation leather with a button stud fastening and a recycled metal buckle in the shape of a snake. Decorated with artificial pearls and sparkly stones. Length 85 cm, width approx. 1.5 cm.

Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Sewn-on charm in the shape of a heart (not in sizes 1½-4Y), and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a pima cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pocket with a concealed button, concealed pockets in the side seams. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and slim legs.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a deep V-neck with a gathered seam.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist with a jacquard-weave elastic waistband.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Short skirt in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and a back pocket with a button. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned slub cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

Cropped blouse in airy organic cotton poplin. Sweetheart neckline with a small lace trim and a vertical drawstring down the front with ties. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim. Covered elastication at the hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend containing glittery threads.
Straw hat with a fabric band. Lined. Width of brim 2.5 cm.
Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Welt chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a turtle neck.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with ribbing and a decorative bow with pompoms at the waist. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hairband in soft faux fur with a sewn-in wrapover detail at the front and wide elastic at the back.
Set with a fleece-lined hat and pair of fleece-lined mittens in a jacquard knit. Hat with a pompom on top and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a text motif in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, straight-style dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in soft fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cropped cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and short puff sleeves that are elasticated at the top and hems. Gathered seam down the front, wide smocking at the back and a seam under the bust with a peplum. Lined at the top.
Top in soft, airy cotton jersey with a jersey-lined, wrapover-front hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Loose fit.
Jacket in soft fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and taped trims at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Bikini briefs in satin and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
High-waisted, ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel at the waist containing a concealed key pocket.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Fitted vest top in microfibre. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and padded imitation leather pendant. Length approx. 15 cm.
Ankle-length, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves and discreet pockets in the side seams with a concealed zip. Lined.

Set with a plumeti blouse and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, short cap sleeves with a scalloped trim, and a scalloped hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.
Jacket in light sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and shoulder pads.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Shorts in a patterned crêpe weave with a wide elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Sleeveless top in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, decorative smocking at the shoulders and smocking at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Stand-up collar, detachable hood, press-studs down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hat in braided paper straw with text embroidery on the brim and a narrow, twisted band with tassels on the ends and a small metal decoration. Width of brim 9 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Skirt in a soft jacquard knit with an elasticated, ribbed waist and ribbed hem.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey and lace with padded, triangular cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Set with a hat and a pair of long ski mittens. Hat with a turned-up hem in faux fur, earflaps lined with faux fur, an adjustable hook and loop tab under the chin and a fleece lining. Padded ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reinforced palms, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, elastication at the top, a hook-and-eye fastener to keep the mittens together and a Thinsulate™ lining. Water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons. Both the hat and mittens have reflective details.
T-shirt in UV-protective fabric with a turtle neck, print motif on the front and short sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No fasteners. Lined.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and trousers knitted in soft organic cotton. Long-sleeved jumper with raglan sleeves and buttons at the top. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Cardigan in soft faux shearling with a small embroidered detail at the top. Small stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped tab, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, slim-fit, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
